title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, September 28, 2019
description: On this day in 1928, Alexander Fleming found that a blue-green mold was killing the staph bacteria he was attempting to grow. Thus was Penicillin discovered.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1928, Alexander Fleming found that a blue-green mold was killing the staph bacteria he was attempting to grow. Thus was Penicillin discovered.
